content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-15.6, 20.4)
Consists of steam engine (position not specified), boiler (position not specified), and offshore pump (position not specified).

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5) and inserter at position that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) that is currently not receiving power.

### Pipe groups
Consists of the following entities
- PipeGroup at position(-4.5, 21.5) with pipes in the group
- PipeGroup at position(-4.5, 23.5) with pipes in the group

### Electricity group at position(-15.6, 20.4)
Consists of several small electric poles positioned around (-22.5, 23.5), (-20.5, 23.5), (-21.5, 23.5), (-19.5, 23.5), (-23.5, 24.5), and (-19.5, 25.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables used in your code are defined before they are referenced. For instance, 'Electric' and 'group' were not defined in the current context.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to power supply
- Check that all entities requiring power, such as the lab and assembling machine, are connected to an electricity source.
